description: A man and a porcupine are seated opposite each other in a restaurant booth with drinks and a bottle of wine on the table. The scene depicts a relationship breakup, rendered absurd by the presence of a porcupine as one of the partners. The surreal situation of a human dating and breaking up with a quill-covered animal in a formal setting highlights the comic's focus on the unusual.
caption: “Look. I just don’t feel the relationship is working out.”
